headline: Carrier Global’s Quiet Dividend Strategy Deserves Attention
summary: Mastercard just distributed $0.87 per share to shareholders on February 9, 2026, marking the payment network’s latest quarterly dividend. While the 14.5% year-over-year increase from $0.76 continues an impressive growth streak, the dividend’s modest yield and conservative payout strategy reveal a company prioritizing buybacks over income generation. The Dividend Scorecard: Solid Growth, Minimal Yield At ... Carrier Global’s Quiet Dividend Strategy Deserves Attention
